text: Weibo personal information protection policy
Update date: March 3, 2022
Effective date: March 3, 2022

In order to effectively protect the personal information of Weibo users and optimize the user experience, Weibo (hereinafter or "us" refers to Beijing Weimengchuangke Network Technology Co., Ltd.) to formulate the "Weibo Personal Information Protection Policy" (according to the current regulations and policiesThe following is referred to as "this policy").
This policy will explain in detail our policies and measures in obtaining, using, managing and protecting user personal information.

We strive to express it in an easy -to -understand and concise text, and mark the stiff characters to be marked with the clauses that are closely related to your rights and interests in this policy to prompt you to pay attention.
Therefore, before you use Weibo, be sure to read it carefully and fully understand this policy. After confirming and consent, you can use Weibo services.
important hint:

1 This policy is applicable to the various products and services provided to you with new forms that include websites, clients, small programs, H5, fast applications, components, widgets, and new forms that appear with technology.Equipment, mobile terminal or Weibo service obtained by other devices.
This policy is not applicable to:

The information collected by a third -party product or service (including any third -party website) accessed by Weibo may include the products or services and advertising content displayed to you in personalized recommendations, or other products or linked in the Weibo or other products or linkedServe;
Information collecting third -party collected by Weibo for advertising;
Information collected by third parties on Weibo on Weibo.

You use these third -party services (including any personal information you provided to these third parties), and will be constrained by these third -party service terms and privacy policies (rather than this policy). For specific regulationsEssence
Please protect your personal information properly and provide third parties only if necessary.

2 Please understand that the client and related services described in this policy may be different according to factors such as the models, system versions, browser versions, software application versions of your loading client equipment.
The final product and service are based on the Weibo client you use.
3 Related terms in this policy, if there is no special agreement, are explained by the applicable data protection laws.

"Applicable data protection laws" mainly refer to laws and regulations related to Chinese personal information protection ("Personal Information Protection Law", "Data Security Law", "Civil Code", "Network Security Law") and its supporting implementation rules, national standards and regulatory requirements(In order to avoid doubt, it does not include the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, the Macau Special Administrative Region and Taiwan Law).

4 You know and understand that some of the services we provide to you may need to process your sensitive personal information. These sensitive personal information will be marked with rough characters to prompt you to pay attention.

We will only process your sensitive personal information based on your consent, provide you with the service you need or to perform legal obligations, and these processing activities will not adversely affect your rights and interests.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will only process your sensitive personal information based on your consent, provide you with the service you need or to fulfill your legal obligations.

text: We will adopt security and technical measures that match the level of sensitive personal information risks in accordance with the law to prevent unauthorized access and personal information leakage, tampering, and loss.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will adopt security and technical measures that match the level of sensitive personal information risks in accordance with the law to prevent unauthorized access and personal information leakage, tampering, and loss.

text: In this policy, we will disclose the necessary matters (including but not limited to the type of purpose, method, and sensitive personal information, etc.) to you in accordance with the law, andReminder you and ask for your separate consent (except for other provisions of the applicable data protection law).
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will disclose the necessary matters to deal with your sensitive personal information to you in accordance with the law, and prompt you and ask you alone in the form of pop -up windows or individual pages in Weibo.

text: This policy will help you understand the following:
1. How do we collect and use your personal information
2. COOKIE and related technology notifications
3. How can we entrust your personal information
4. How do we protect your personal information
5. How do we store your personal information
6. Your personal information subject right
7. How do we collect and handle personal information of minors
8. Update of this policy
9. How to contact us
1. How do we collect and use your personal information
1 The personal information you voluntarily provided to us
1.1 Registration and login account

When you register a Weibo account or use other account management functions, we will collect and log in through the registration and login to collect your account nickname, password, password protection option, email, mobile phone number.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We will collect your account nickname, password, password protection option, email, mobile phone number through the registration and login process.

text: If you log in to Weibo in other ways, we will request your personal information from a third party in the affiliate. For personal information that we ask but cannot provide third parties, we may still ask you: (1) when you use the QQ account numberWhen logging in, we will access your QQ avatar, nickname, regional and gender information;
label: First Party Collection Information

text: (2) When you log in with WeChat accounts, we will get your WeChat avatar, WeChat nickname, gender and regional information;
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you log in with a WeChat account, we will get your WeChat avatar, WeChat nickname, gender and regional information.

text: (3) When you log in with Apple, ID, we will get the email address of your Apple, ID.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you log in with the Apple ID, we will get the email address of your Apple ID.

text: In order to ensure the security of the account and implement the real -name system of the network, when you use other methods to log in and use some functions of Weibo, you may still need to bind an effective mobile phone number.

Collecting this information is to help you create a Weibo account and provide real -name verification on you. If you refuse to provide this information, it will affect your registration and use Weibo.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collecting this information is to help you create a Weibo account and provide real -name verification on you. If you refuse to provide this information, it will affect your registration and use Weibo.

text: In order to log in to and use the products provided by us and related parties, we use a unified account system. You can use Weibo account to log in, use Weibo and other products.

If you modify the account information (including account passwords, password protection options, emails, and mobile phone numbers) in any product, these modifications will automatically synchronize to your unified account number.
If you understand and agree, if you cancel your account in any product, it may affect your use of other products.
In addition, if you want to set up a "adolescent model" for your children under the age of 14, we will collect information about your child's account nickname, gender, and year of birth.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you want to set up a "adolescent model" for your children under the age of 14, we will collect information about your child's account nickname, gender, and year of birth.

text: For details, please refer to the "Personal Information Protection Policy of Weibo Children's Personal Information".

1.2, when you browse Weibo information flow, we will provide you with personalities based on your device information, IP address, location information, personal homepage information, and your behavior information (that isRecommended service service.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: We will provide you with personalized content recommendation services based on your device information, IP address, location information, personal homepage information, and your behavior information.

text: You can independently control the opening and closing of personalized content recommendation services in Weibo settings (path: Weibo-me-setting-privacy settings-personalized content recommendation), which will not affect other functions of your normally using Weibo.
label: Edit/Control
Usage
Important
rewrite: You can independently control the opening and closing of personalized content recommendation services in Weibo settings, which will not affect other functions of your normally using Weibo.

text: For the relevant information and services provided for you in the Weibo (such as information and advertising push, location marking, location sign -in, "same city" service, the topic of the Weibo publisher \ place \ weather \ Super Talk recommendation guidance), such as guidance), such asYour device supports these options, and we will collect your accurate location information or rough location information after you open your positioning authority.
label: Edit/Control
Usage
Important
rewrite: For the relevant information and services provided by you in the Weibo, if your device supports these options, we will collect your accurate location information or rough location information after you open your positioning authority.

text: You know and understand that we may rely on other information (such as IP address, Wi-Fi access point, mobile signal base station location, etc.) to judge your approximate location and provide you with information and services based on such positions.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: We may rely on other information (such as IP address, Wi-Fi access point, mobile signal base station location, etc.) to judge your approximate location and provide you with information and services based on such locations.

text: 1.3 Release and interaction
When you publish or forward Weibo, comment or send private messages with other users, we will collect the content you posted (including text, pictures or videos).
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We will collect the content you posted (including text, pictures or videos).

text: If the pictures or videos you use when you release Weibo include location information, we will extract such location information and use it as the alternative item of your labeling location information;
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: The pictures or video containing location information you used when you post on Weibo will extract such location information and use it as a sequinity for your labeling location information.

text: You can also choose or guidance based on our recommendation and guidance to marked the geographical location of the Weibo content that you plan to release.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: You can also choose or guidance based on our recommendation and guidance to marked the geographical location of the Weibo content that you plan to release.

text: If you refuse to open the positioning authority or provide location information, you will not be able to mark the location information on the published content.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
rewrite: If you refuse to open the positioning authority or provide location information, you will not be able to mark the location information on the published content.

text: 1.4, when you sign in and sharing functions in your location, we will collect your location information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you sign in and sharing function in your place, we will collect your location information.

text: If you refuse to provide location information, you will not be able to use this feature.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you refuse to provide location information, you will not be able to use this feature.

First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you use the function of a communication records, we will collect your address book information.

text: If you refuse to provide this information, you will not be able to use this feature.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you refuse to provide this information, you will not be able to use this feature.

text: 1.6 Weibo live broadcast
When you watch the live broadcast, we will not collect your information extra.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you watch the live broadcast, we will not collect your information extra.

text: When you initiate a live broadcast, you need to provide us with your real name and ID number, so that we can provide you with real -name authentication in accordance with the requirements of relevant laws and regulations, and open the camera and microphone on the device.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: You need to provide us with your real name and ID number to perform real -name authentication and turn on the camera and microphone on the device.

text: When you release a live broadcast appointment, you need to provide an introduction information for the live broadcast and designated broadcast time, and shoot or upload live broadcast trailer videos.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: You need to provide an introduction information and designated broadcast time for the reservation live broadcast, and shoot or upload a live broadcast trailer video.

text: If you want to interact with the anchor you watch, you may need to turn on the camera and microphone on your device;
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
rewrite: If you want to interact with the anchor you watch, you may need to turn on the camera and microphone on your device.

text: When you watch the live broadcast function with free traffic, we may also need to confirm your disqualification of your free service based on your IMSI.

If you plan to create a live broadcast appointment, you can also open the calendar permissions on the device so that we can create the schedule and remind you before the start of the live broadcast. You can also adjust the cover picture of your live broadcast or mark your live broadcast position according to your willingness.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
rewrite: If you plan to create a live broadcast appointment, you can also open the calendar authority on the device.

text: If you refuse to provide this information or open up related permissions, you will not be able to use the functions corresponding to such information and permissions, but it will not affect you to watch, initiate or make an appointment for live broadcast.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
rewrite: If you refuse to provide this information or open up related permissions, you will not be able to use the functions corresponding to such information and permissions, but it will not affect you to watch, initiate or make an appointment for live broadcast.

text: 1.7 Weibo wallet function

When you use the Weibo wallet function, you will need to bind your Alipay account. We will collect your Alipay account to authorize the information we get (including name, login name, corporate name, nickname, avatar, gender, region and usersStatus) and the binding relationship between the Alipay account and Weibo account so that you can complete the withdrawal or use the wallet balance.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you use the Weibo wallet function, we will collect your Alipay account to authorize the information we obtain and the binding relationship between the Alipay account and the Weibo account.

text: If you refuse to bind, you will not be able to use the withdrawal of the Weibo wallet and the balance payment function.

1.8, when you use video creation and content management functions, we will collect and show you your video content, video cover, video description, and information about comments, interaction related to you so that you can check and manage.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We will collect and show you your video content, video cover, video description, information, interaction and other information related to you, so that you can check and manage.

text: If you need to upload videos, you need to authorize us to access the album or external storage information, otherwise we will not be able to obtain the video content in your device.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
rewrite: If you need to upload videos, you need to authorize us to access the album or external storage information, otherwise we will not be able to obtain the video content in your device.

Important
rewrite: If you need to make video creation, you may also need to turn on the camera and microphone on the device.

label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you need to settle the revenue of the video on the platform, you need to provide us with your real name, Alipay account, mobile phone number, ID number, so that we can verify your identity and make money to you.

text: If you refuse to provide this information, we will not be able to settle related income for you.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you refuse to provide this information, we will not be able to settle related income for you.

rewrite: When you edit your personal homepage, you can edit your nickname, avatar, gender, birthday and local information, and you can actively fill in the expansion information according to the actual situation.

text: 1.10, when you use Weibo authentication functions (including identity certification, interest certification, gold V certification, super -topic certification, video certification, articles/quiz certification, and other authentication types that are added from time to time) or other required real -name authenticationWhen the service (for example, when you open a Weibo store), we will collect your name, mobile phone number, ID information, and career information based on the service types you use.Verification.

First Party Collection Information

text: Collect this information to help you complete your identity authentication.
We will protect your personal information to the greatest extent. If you do not provide this information, we will not be able to provide relevant services.

Among them, for some account numbers (such as real -name official accounts) involving public information dissemination, we will force the identity card information of the main responsible person (such as account operators) to maintain the order of public communication.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: In response to some accounts involving public information dissemination, we will force the identity card information of the main responsible person to maintain the order of public communication.

text: Except for the above situations, we generally do not enforce the user's ID information.
1.11, when you use Weibo "City" service, we will collect your location information so that we can show you the content of the "same city" users based on your geographical location.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information

Edit/Control

First Party Collection Information

First Party Collection Information

text: 2 The personal information we collect indirectly

When you use the access to a third -party application on Weibo, in order to provide the purpose of providing docking technical support, developers and technical service providers of third -party applications from this third -party application may obtain your necessary personal information, such as device information, Operation Behavior Log Information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information

text: If you involve your sensitive personal information, we will authorize you alone.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
First Party Collection Information
Data Security
rewrite: If you involve your sensitive personal information, we will authorize you alone.

text: If you refuse us to collect relevant personal information, all or part of the function of third -party applications cannot be implemented, but it does not affect other functions of your use of Weibo.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you refuse us to collect relevant personal information, all or part of the function of third -party applications cannot be implemented, but it does not affect other functions of your use of Weibo.

label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Risk

text: It is recommended that you read and confirm such privacy policies before receiving relevant services and providing personal information.
3 The personal information we collect automatically

When you use our services through the service entrances of the website, client, small program, etc., we may automatically collect your IP address, device model, unique device recognition code, browser model, rough location information (for example, for exampleState or urban information), the installation application information, and other equipment technical information, we will also collect some log information you use our service, such as the page you have visited or the link you have clicked.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We may automatically collect your IP address, device model, unique device recognition code, browser model, rough location information, installation application information, and other device technical information from your device.

text: Collecting such information is mainly to ensure the safe operation of services, and it can also make us better understand you, such as where you and what our services have attracted you.
We use these information for internal analysis and improve service quality and service correlation (such as information and content that you may be interested in).
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: We use these information for internal analysis and improve service quality and service correlation for you.

text: At the same time, we also need to retain the corresponding logs to record the running status of service entrances such as our website, mobile client, in order to comply with the provisions of laws and regulations.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We also need to retain the corresponding logs to record the running status of service entrances such as our website, mobile client.

text: This information is generally collected through the cookies or similar tracking technology we use. For details, please refer to the "Cookie and related technical notification" part below.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: This information is generally collected through the cookies or similar tracking technology we use. For details, please refer to the "Cookie and related technical notification" part below.

text: 4 The device permissions we obtain
To provide you with convenient and high -quality services, we may call some permissions on your device.
When you use the corresponding function, you will see the pop -up reminder and ask if you authorize.
You can choose to close part or all permissions in the setting function of the client or device.

Edit/Control

label: Important
Edit/Control

text: 5. According to the relevant provisions of the applicable data protection law, in the following circumstances, we have the right to deal with your personal authority (including collection, use, commission processing, sharing, transfer, and public disclosure) without obtaining your authorization consent).information:

text: 2. Cookie and related technology notifications

1 Cookie and related technologies can help websites identify registered users. Calculate the number of users. It is usually used by various websites to determine whether the user who has completed the registration has been logged in. We use cookies and related technologies to achieve the following functions or services:
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 1.1 Safety and efficient operation of products or services.
We may set COOKIE with authentication and security to confirm whether you log in to the service safely, or whether you encounter dispersion, fraud and other illegal behaviors.
These technologies also help us improve service efficiency, improve login and response speed.
1.2 Simplify your operation steps.
Using such technologies can help you save the steps and processes of personal information and enter search content to help you get a easier access experience.
1.3 Recommend, display, and push the content or account you may be interested in.

We may use such technologies to understand your preferences and use habits, analyze data to improve product services, recommend information or functions you are interested in, and optimize your choice of advertising.
label: Important
Usage

text: 4. How do we protect your personal information

1. We will do our best to protect your personal information, and to protect personal information by special data security departments to prevent your personal information from being illegally accessed and copied without accidental and unauthorized conditions., Modify, transmit, lose, destroy, deal with or use.

Data Security

Data Security

Data Security

Data Security

Data Security

Data Security

Data Security

Data Security

Therefore, you should take positive measures to ensure the security of personal information, such as regularly modify the account password, and do not disclose personal information such as your account password to others.

5. There are always risks of various information leaks in the network environment. When accidental events, force majeure and other circumstances lead to leakage of your information, we will strongly control the situation and inform you of the cause of the incident in time.Active information such as security measures.

Data Security

Data Security

text: Once the user information security incident occurs, we will inform you in a timely manner in accordance with the requirements of the laws and regulations: the basic situation and possible impact of the security incident, the disposal measures we have adopted or we are going to take, your suggestions that can prevent and reduce risks independently prevent and reduce risksRemedy for your remedy.

Data Security
